add.title: PAR Notification Slip
add.description: Printout of the Pre-Arrival Registration (PAR) notification slip.

steps_flow.title: Apply PAR
steps_flow.description: Visit the GovHK website for Pre-Arrival Registration.

steps_flow.title: Enter Details
steps_flow.description: Enter passport details exactly as they appear.

steps_flow.title: Instant Result
steps_flow.description: Get instant approval. Print the Notification Slip on A4 paper.

steps_flow.title: Travel
steps_flow.description: Fly to Hong Kong. Show PAR slip and Passport.
